info.name: Contacts
info.summary: Manage and sync your contacts across multiple devices
info.description: The ownCloud Contacts App is a user interface for ownCloud's CardDAV server. It provides your ownCloud with a feature-rich frontend for the CardDAV server component and supports multiple address books. Therefore ownCloud Contacts empowers users to backup, restore, manage and sync their contacts across devices using the CardDAV protocol. Whether on your mobile device or desktop, with the Contacts App you can always keep your address books in sync with your ownCloud!
info.author: Hendrik Leppelsack, Thomas MÃ¼ller, Alexander Weidinger, Jan-Christoph Borchardt, Tom Needham
